function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate hierarchy of infection control in indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor air ventilation in buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creation of new disease conditions by building systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of sanitation in sewage systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Aerosols containing pathogens can be inhalable and remain viable for hours","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in quantitatively comparing the relative contribution of airborne transmission with other transmission modes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Infectious pandemics necessitate new strategies in the built environment to prevent disease transmission and increase resilience","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Subjects with weak immune systems at risk of symptomatic infection, including those undergoing immunosuppressive therapy and those with excessive workload or irregular sleep patterns.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission routes of sars-cov-2 include direct contact, droplet deposition on surfaces and people, and airborne cross-infection through exhaled air.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Severe symptomatology more frequent in elderly subjects, people with concomitant pathologies, and young subjects with weak immune systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased immune defense due to excessive workload and irregular circadian sleep-wake rhythm","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmissibility and entry of sars-cov-2 through access routes such as oral cavity, nasal cavity, eyes, and mucous membranes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of infective diseases between the population","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unauthorized access to restricted content","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Misuse of downloaded content","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Data loss or corruption during download","category":"Structure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of suitable ventilation system for infection control","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of fire safety features for a makeshift hospital","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate space for fundamental and auxiliary medical and nonmedical operations","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective health and safety management for facility users","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient design flexibility in response to crisis situations","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overwhelmed traditional hospitals leading to makeshift hospital development","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uncertainty in futureproofing requirements","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of experience in workshop attendees","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misalignment of design with public health trends","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of virus stability on temperature","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disposal protocols for medical waste","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of futureproofing in asset management practice","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliability of electrical infrastructure supporting icu ventilators and equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate medical gas supply network","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagion due to inadequate video and audio surveillance","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient ventilation in makeshift hospitals may increase infection risk of opportunistic airborne transmission.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pressure regime in ventilation systems may lead to contaminated air escaping from isolation rooms.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Features facilitating rapid conversion of large public venues","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Requirement for specific space and infrastructure for medical facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-infection risk in the built environment","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Makeshift hospitals not designed for medical care purposes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provision of medical care and attention in a physical space","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lifespan of hospital designs and construction projects","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inflexible hospital designs","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid conversion of public venues into healthcare facilities","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adaptive design strategies for public venues","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of 2019-ncov virus leading to global outbreak","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dramatic changes in public and private life due to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid construction of emergency medical facility in response to pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous access to ugs limiting benefits and exacerbating pandemic impact.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of increased infection in houses with several occupants","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on internet-based technologies for data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Visiting ugss close to homes with family or friends","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Living in small apartments with several occupants in highly populated neighbourhoods predisposes the afro-american community to acquire
